java112.analyzer

Class KeywordAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.KeywordAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Analyzer

    public class KeywordAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Analyzer
    This is the KeywordAnalyzer class that implements the interface: analyzer. Outputs keywords as keys to a Map and their occurences in a large text file as their values.

      void inputLoop(java.io.BufferedReader input)
      This method holds a loop of inputed lines to be read and added to the array.
      void keywordMapLoop(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      This method loops through the keyword HashMap building the output string.
      void processToken(java.lang.String token)
      This method is passed an individual token and adds it to a TreeMap every time this is done.
      void readKeywordFile()
      This method instantiates the BufferedReader and calls the inputLoop method.
      void tokensLoop(java.lang.String[] tokenArray)
      tokensLoop loops through the ArrayList tokens, checks for nulls then passes the token to the analyzers.
      void valueLoop(java.lang.StringBuilder sb, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> nums)
      This method loops through the keyword HashMap's value of nums List building the output string.
      void writeOutputFile(java.lang.String inputFilePath)
      This method writes output to the token_count text file.
